UniprotID	Q15208
Accession	Q15208;Q503A1
EntryName	STK38_HUMAN
ProteinName	Serine/threonine-protein kinase 38 (EC 2.7.11.1) (NDR1 protein kinase) (Nuclear Dbf2-related kinase 1)
GeneName	STK38 NDR1
Length	465
Function	Serine/threonine-protein kinase that acts as a negative regulator of MAP3K1/2 signaling (PubMed:12493777, PubMed:15197186, PubMed:17906693, PubMed:7761441). Converts MAP3K2 from its phosphorylated form to its non-phosphorylated form and inhibits autophosphorylation of MAP3K2 (PubMed:12493777, PubMed:15197186, PubMed:17906693, PubMed:7761441). Acts as an ufmylation 'reader' in a kinase-independent manner: specifically recognizes and binds mono-ufmylated histone H4 in response to DNA damage, promoting the recruitment of SUV39H1 to the double-strand breaks, resulting in ATM activation (PubMed:32537488).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Chromosome
Disorder	0.7415,0.7209,0.7331,0.7672,0.7916,0.8013,0.8050,0.8125,0.8162,0.7547,0.7672,0.7595,0.7843,0.7982,0.7289,0.7289,0.6427,0.6427,0.6136,0.5707,0.4801,0.4801,0.5098,0.4441,0.3599,0.3286,0.3321,0.3460,0.3460,0.3494,0.4051,0.4051,0.4017,0.3948,0.4051,0.4582,0.4507,0.4441,0.4476,0.4292,0.4652,0.5211,0.5254,0.5176,0.5992,0.6948,0.6183,0.6089,0.5854,0.5901,0.5901,0.5854,0.5758,0.5139,0.5139,0.4979,0.5017,0.4801,0.5620,0.5254,0.5211,0.5901,0.6322,0.6322,0.6375,0.4979,0.4220,0.4940,0.4186,0.4149,0.4087,0.4051,0.4051,0.3321,0.4087,0.3356,0.3460,0.3460,0.2715,0.2752,0.2988,0.2292,0.2258,0.1643,0.1028,0.0985,0.1702,0.2364,0.2129,0.1852,0.1881,0.2002,0.1424,0.1399,0.1399,0.0985,0.1528,0.1424,0.1373,0.2292,0.2258,0.2224,0.3019,0.2399,0.2164,0.2715,0.2364,0.2328,0.1554,0.1137,0.1914,0.1881,0.1528,0.2094,0.1823,0.1759,0.2470,0.2328,0.2503,0.2645,0.1969,0.1914,0.1969,0.1206,0.1643,0.2193,0.2541,0.2849,0.2918,0.2918,0.2918,0.2292,0.2470,0.2470,0.2436,0.2783,0.2783,0.1583,0.1115,0.0690,0.0646,0.0780,0.0380,0.0218,0.0372,0.0194,0.0240,0.0223,0.0227,0.0141,0.0244,0.0235,0.0205,0.0125,0.0097,0.0085,0.0089,0.0079,0.0088,0.0133,0.0184,0.0188,0.0227,0.0356,0.0483,0.0494,0.0605,0.0334,0.0263,0.0263,0.0454,0.0414,0.0734,0.0749,0.1251,0.2094,0.2609,0.2609,0.3774,0.4766,0.3249,0.2364,0.1554,0.1323,0.1731,0.2094,0.1501,0.1501,0.1969,0.1528,0.1554,0.1554,0.0948,0.0929,0.1583,0.0985,0.0909,0.0398,0.0218,0.0209,0.0198,0.0398,0.0398,0.0676,0.0985,0.0929,0.0985,0.0851,0.0835,0.0581,0.1028,0.0985,0.0967,0.1583,0.1528,0.0985,0.1528,0.0948,0.1759,0.2645,0.1583,0.1583,0.0967,0.1070,0.1115,0.0929,0.0531,0.0463,0.0799,0.1115,0.1671,0.1611,0.1671,0.1852,0.0985,0.0555,0.0851,0.0948,0.0967,0.1048,0.0967,0.1791,0.1162,0.2064,0.2752,0.2783,0.1731,0.2575,0.1554,0.1702,0.2094,0.1791,0.1914,0.1852,0.1643,0.2715,0.3631,0.3356,0.3392,0.4256,0.3087,0.3117,0.3117,0.4051,0.3774,0.3774,0.3807,0.4149,0.3872,0.3983,0.3807,0.3704,0.3529,0.3426,0.3494,0.3807,0.3910,0.3019,0.2541,0.2129,0.2328,0.3494,0.2951,0.1969,0.1
